dialogues.text: Well, well. I see you have found our little hideout. I must say I am impressed.
I heard someone was investigating the pollution, so I assume that must be you. I did not expect you here so fast, to be honest.
No matter. Sooner or later, the Celenor elves would have found out either way.
The Halogwyr has been busy as of late, I'm sure you've noticed. While I'd love to stick around and tell you our plans, I think that would be too easy.
What's the fun in spoiling it? Besides, it is much more fun to find out on your own, right? Go ahead and search the lab, we are finished here.
Alas, I'm afraid I can't stay here for chit-chat. I have other business to attend to. There is still much to do.
You probably have lots of questions right now, he he. They will have to wait. Something tells me we shall meet again.
